com.cognifide.slice.api.provider

Interface ComponentDefinitionResolver

  • Deprecated. 
    Please use ComponentDefinitionProvider

    @ConsumerType
 @Deprecated
public interface ComponentDefinitionResolver
    An optional service creating a component definition. If there is no OSGi service implementing this interface, Slice will use an administrative resource resolver to create a component definition. This may be used as a bridge between already existing component definition provider (eg. ComponentManager in AEM) and Slice.
    Author:
    Tomasz RÄ™kawek

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Object> getComponentDefinition(String resourceType)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a definition of a component defined by specified resourceType in form of its properties map.

    • Method Detail

      • getComponentDefinition

        Map<String,Object> getComponentDefinition(String resourceType)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a definition of a component defined by specified resourceType in form of its properties map.
        Parameters:
        resourceType - resource type of a component
        Returns:
        Map of resource properties or null if there's no resource under path specified in resourceType parameter.
